title: The Decision
description: A game about life and death

title: Flipdot Clock
description: A Flipdot Clock built with an old LAWO Bus Display
content: FunctionalityThis project is a clock and display made out of an old LAWO flipdot-display. It is able to display time, weather and departures of public transport near the place I live.<h1 i...

title: Breadboard Chip-8
content: DescriptionChip-8 describes an “assembly-type” language as well as a typically interpreted virtual machine. I built a hardware CPU which is capable of every CHIP-8 instruction. This was a quite challenging task becau...
